attributes.action: 'hold an public inquiry into  Lloyd's Insurance.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Insurance Companies Act 1982 required Lloyd's to conduct an  annual audit to establish investors solvency. This was not  carried out which resulted in losses remaining unknown.
We welcome the Prime Minister’s
actions in establishing this petition right.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
